text: <@U7SL518D6> Not sure if this is expected behavior but Im finding that as I add files to a child theme — the corresponding files in the parent theme are being deleted instead of simply ignored/overwritten. Is this supposed to be happening?

uhh that’s not supposed to happen.

 Your theme folder name is different correct?
<@U7SL518D6> correct — this has happened both times Ive built using themes

Im noticing it happens primarily when I have a watch command running on my child theme folder and create a new file that already exists in the parent theme. Typically that parent theme file gets blown away after that
any chance you can copy n paste what you were seeing in the terminal, and a link to the parent and child theme in the DM?
Can you link to the child theme in the design manager?
